results.title: Fifth of despair
results.brief_description: Discusses the disease of alcoholism and the necessary procedures in treatment of the problem. Looks at programmes in the United States which are involved in rehabilitation and treatment of alcoholics. Among many organisations attempting to solve the problem are the A.A., Salvation Army and numerous honour ranches.

results.title: Fifteenth Olympic Games - Helsinki: Men's diving
results.brief_description: Made with the official sanction of FINA, this film records the following diving events at the Helsinki Olympic Games: -Workouts on tower and springboard; final three-meter springboard- men; final platform- men; final platform diving- women.

results.title: Festliches Nuernberg = Nuremberg rally
results.brief_description: Coverage of the 1937 Nuremberg Rally. The film opens with views of Nuremberg immediately prior to the rally. Hitler is seen arriving in Nuremberg by aeroplane and driving through crowd lined streets to a rousing reception. Propaganda shots of factory production, farming activities etc., precede coverage of the rally itself. Shots of massed troops parading before Hitler are followed by a display of military weapons etc. The film closes with night scenes of the rally and a fireworks display. There is no commentary.

results.title: Fern the Red Deer (Captioned)
results.brief_description: A marvellous adventure story, filmed on location in remote Exmoor, about an abandoned deer calf. The deer calf forms a bond with two young children and together they fight for the wild deer’s survival. Rated: G

results.title: Female vampire = La Comtesse noire [DVD] (E)
results.creator_credit: Jesus Franco, Marius Lesoeur, Brux International Picture and Films Marc
results.brief_description: This influential erotic horror film, directed by Jesus Franco, established the reputation of erotic actress and horror icon, Lina Romay. In this unabashed performance she plays Countess Iriana of Karlstein, a mute vampire who resides on a remote island, feeding off men and women to satiate her desire to literally suck the life out of her lovers. Iriana faces a new challenge when she meets a poet who believes himself destined to become her lover and, like her, immortal. Simultaneously a scientist Dr. Roberts and his colleague, Dr. Orlof, become aware that a vampire is at work and set about finding him or her. “Female vampire” has a dream-like quality, and similar to “Vampyros Lesbos”, has achieved cult status amid horror buffs. Various cuts of this film exist; this version favours the sexuality of the characters over the more graphic horror elements. The deleted scenes in special features contains scenes of a more bloody nature. Features excessive nudity, and scenes of masturbation and oral sex that are quite explicit. Cast includes Jack Taylor, Alice Arno, Monica Swinn. This film is also known under the following titles: Bare Breasted Countess, Erotikill, Erotikiller and The Loves of Irina. Please note, this is the dubbed English language version.

results.title: Feeling good about yourself
results.creator_credit: Alan Shulman and Feeling Good Associates
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the “yes-no” process - a dynamic method of assertiveness training - with a group of intellectually handicapped people. Shows participants in a workshop going through discussion sessions and experiential exercises exploring issues such as victimisation, making oneself understood, self-esteem, personal strength and sex education. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
results.description: Demonstrates the “yes-no” process - a dynamic method of assertiveness training - with a group of intellectually handicapped people. results.title: Federation Square time lapse project
results.brief_description: Time lapse footage of the construction of the Federation Square site. Includes hourly photos take from the architect’s office, commencing April 1998. Intended to be used for a short animation sequence.

results.title: Federal highway
results.creator_credit: Michael Healy, British Road Federation and Richard Costain Film Unit
results.brief_description: A tour of West Germany to inspect the rapidly developing trunk road and urban motorway system. Through the Rhineland from Frankfurt to Cologne, then to Hamburg and Berlin, we see some of the road and bridge works. Aerial views of complex autobahn junctions and intersections which cannot be appreciated from the ground.
